title: Jennifer Garner beams from ear-to-ear as she arrives in a black suit to the InStyle Awards
text:
The InStyle Awards are well underway and Jennifer Garner has officially arrived.

Jennifer looked elegant in a black suit as she gave a big smile while walking the red carpet ahead of the award show.

The 47-year-old is joined by a handful of other A-list celebs such as Zendaya, Rachel Bilson, Jessica Alba, and Kaley Cuoco.

Elegant: Jennifer Garner looked elegant in a black suit as she gave a big smile while walking the red carpet ahead of the The InStyle Awards

For the occasion, she wore a black pair of slacks and a matching suit jacket that she left open to reveal her white button up blouse.

She posed with her hands tucked into her pant pockets and smiled at the camera with the effortless look and subtle pink lip.

To top the entire look off, she wore a pair of black high heels with a diamond chain in the middle of her foot.

Working it! For the occasion, she wore a black pair of slacks and a matching suit jacket that she left open to reveal her white button up blouse

Recently, Jennifer joined forces with another famous Hollywood mother, Kristen Bell.

The two recently sat down for season four of Bell's Momsplaining with Kristen Bell where they sat down to chat with other mothers about the trials and triumphs of motherhood.

'I think it is the most romantic day you'll ever experience,' Jennifer said in response to a comment about giving birth.

She currently shares her kids Violet, 13, Seraphina, 10, and Samuel, aged seven with her ex husband Ben Affleck.

Posing! Jennifer is seen posing with Adir Abergel at the fifth annual event

'You're a better person than I am because I was gonna say, 'It's gonna look like a homicide,'' Bell chirped up as she talks about her two daughters Lincoln, aged six, and Delta, aged four, whom she shares with her husband Dax Shepard.

The two moms looked gorgeous as they welcomed other guests as they chatted about calling their babies by their full name, which they agreed does not work.

“You have to just be like, ‘Can you believe this little sh** is having a tantrum?’ ” Garner said. “I would say that is the mindset.”
description: The InStyle Awards are well underway and Jennifer Garner has officially arrived. Jennifer looked elegant in a suit as she gave a big smile while walking the red carpet ahead of the award show.
